Settings.QueryText: SELECT Counterparties.Ref AS Ref, Counterparties.IsFolder, Counterparties.Description AS Description, Counterparties.Code AS Code, CAST(Counterparties.DescriptionFull AS String(250)) AS FullDescr, Counterparties.LegalEntityIndividual, Counterparties.TIN, Counterparties.KPP, Counterparties.BankAccountByDefault, Counterparties.ContractByDefault, Counterparties.Individual, Counterparties.Responsible AS ResponsibleManager, Counterparties.ContactPerson AS ContactPerson, Counterparties.CodeByOKPO, Counterparties.AccessGroup, Counterparties.Comment, Counterparties.CreationDate, Counterparties.TINEnteredCorrectly, Counterparties.KPPEnteredCorrectly, Counterparties.UpdateSuccessful, CASE WHEN CounterpartyDuplicatesExist.Counterparty IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS ThereAreDuplicates, CASE WHEN (Counterparties.TINEnteredCorrectly AND Counterparties.KPPEnteredCorrectly OR Counterparties.TINEnteredCorrectly AND Counterparties.LegalEntityIndividual = VALUE(Enum.LegalEntityIndividual.Ind)) AND CounterpartiesStates.State = VALUE(Enum.CounterpartyExistenceStates.ActivitiesDissolved) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS ActivitiesDissolved, CASE WHEN (Counterparties.TINEnteredCorrectly AND Counterparties.KPPEnteredCorrectly OR Counterparties.TINEnteredCorrectly AND Counterparties.LegalEntityIndividual = VALUE(Enum.LegalEntityIndividual.Ind)) AND CounterpartiesStates.State IN (VALUE(Enum.CounterpartyExistenceStates.NotAvailableInRegistry), VALUE(Enum.CounterpartyExistenceStates.KKPDoesNotMeetTIN)) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS CounterpartyDoesNotExist, Counterparties.Tags.( Tag ) FROM Catalog.Counterparties AS Counterparties LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.CounterpartyDuplicatesExist AS CounterpartyDuplicatesExist ON Counterparties.Ref = CounterpartyDuplicatesExist.Counterparty AND Counterparties.TIN = CounterpartyDuplicatesExist.TIN AND Counterparties.KPP = CounterpartyDuplicatesExist.KPP LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.CounterpartiesStates AS CounterpartiesStates ON Counterparties.Ref = CounterpartiesStates.Counterparty {WHERE Counterparties.Ref AS Search}

v8:item.v8:content: Reflection mode before the full-text search application
